forum.content:
Dating with you just only few hours ...we take dinner together....
and after dinner we walking 🚶🏻‍♀️ around the parkway.....oh that times a little bit rainy and am use my small cute umbrella
you are so 體貼...when am coughing.you give me comfort.and you carry my green bag 💼
and hold my wise ...but that is our first time
so sweet in my mind that i never forget it
and we apart then am going home 🏡
and you give a sweet kisses 😘

thank you for that times
so sweet .....
i wishes you as like me
missing each other ....
really i like you so much guy
damn it !!!!

你真的是一個很貼心的guy
it’s my fault
am only blame my self ....
to hurry and misunderstanding you

i will kept all in my life my mind
and so sorry can not be with you when your birthday 🎉day and can not give you anything
specially gift 🎁

am never hope you will coming back to me
if you heartless.....
but i will never stop ✋ for missing you 🍀
forum.title: i need you ❤️
